name: Feed The Flames
description:
WASD to move and K to interact.
----------------------------------------------
You’re a man trying to keep his family warm in the middle of an icy blizzard.
Just keep the fire lit until morning without freezing to death.
Submission for Ludum Dare 46. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/feed-the-flames-1

Updated to fix issue with game not resetting initial states, including starting campfire fuel that resulted in insta-death and on winning the game playing again in daylight.
